analysis: The project is a black holes themed website with an existing HTML structure, CSS styling, and JavaScript for animations. The current theme needs to be enhanced with a cosmic, dark aesthetic, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The CSS file is incomplete and requires additional styles for the black hole theme. The JavaScript file has syntax errors that need to be fixed to ensure proper functionality of the animations and interactions.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
